  • Uses of Game in jeroquest.logic

    Methods in jeroquest.logic with parameters of type Game
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static boolean Jeroquest.blocked​(Game currentGame, Character c)
    Check if the character is blocked, that means if it cannot move in any direction: N, S, E, W (this method is static since it is given by the rules of the game)

  • Uses of Game in jeroquest.units

    boolean Character.actionCombat​(Game currentGame)
    Combat action for the character
    int Character.actionMovement​(Game currentGame)

    void Character.combat​(Character c, Game currentGame)
    Simulates an combat with other character, it does the attack and the defence.
    void Character.resolveTurn​(Game currentGame)
    AI: character's Artificial Intelligence It does the actions in a given turn: attack and movement
    DynamicVectorXYLocation Character.validPositions​(Game currentGame)
    Returns an array with the valid squares where a character can move directly from its current position:(N, S, E and W)
    DynamicVectorCharacters Character.validTargets​(Game currentGame)
    Returns an array with the valid targets for this character
